text.*:
Childhood cataract is cataract that occurs at birth or in childhood.[1] It may be congenital or acquired.

See also[edit]

  • Blindness

References[edit]

  1. ^ Medsinge, Anagha; Nischal, Ken K. (2015-01-01). "Pediatric cataract: challenges and future directions" (PDF). Clinical Ophthalmology. Auckland, N.Z. 9: 77–90. doi:10.2147/OPTH.S59009. ISSN 1177-5467. PMC 4293928 . PMID 25609909. 
Further reading
  • Childhood cataracts at NHS Choices
  • Cataracts in Children, Congenital and Acquired at EyeWiki
